name: Galaxy Odyssey
description: Galaxy Odyssey is a game of the Platforms genre, the player is Felix, the best in his field, a soldier, a cell biologist, a bacteriologist and an infectious disease specialist wakes up near the sea, he cannot find the ship or the crew in which he was heading towards the unknown, He is on an unrecognizable planet and must advance to survive, for himself and for humanity. Try to escape of this place without getting so much damaged!
